author: Mac Alister
description: Rich blackcurrant fruit balanced by dry vermouth and the flavoursome spirituous notes of gin and kirschwasser. Don't be tempted to stir this cocktail, it's better shaken as aeration and dilution are crucial to its success. Best enjoyed while still foaming.
name: Gasoline

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
